value: So now､ you’ll be the host. Shall we try serving the tea?
You don’t need to be nervous about it. What’s more important than serving the tea skillfully…
Is thinking that you want everyone to enjoy delicious tea.
Enjoy it… I’ll try it out､ then!
Thank you for making the tea!
*gulp*… Whoa…! It’s a little bitter､ but it perks me up!
It smells good… It’s sweet and yummy!
It was good!? …Hehe､ that makes me happy! I did it､ big bro Kurou!
Yes…! It seems his heart came through with the hospitality…!
